    using System.Web.WebPages;

    [System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("RazorGenerator", "v.v.v.v")]
    public static class MvcHelperTest_cshtml
    {

public static System.Web.WebPages.HelperResult GamerTag(this HtmlHelper helper, string gamerTag) {
return new System.Web.WebPages.HelperResult(__razor_helper_writer => {


                                                           
    string css = "my-css";
    if (gamerTag.IsEmpty()) {
        throw new ArgumentException(CommonResources.Argument_Cannot_Be_Null_Or_Empty, "gamerTag");
    }

WebViewPage.WriteLiteralTo(@__razor_helper_writer, "    <iframe class=\"");


WebViewPage.WriteTo(@__razor_helper_writer, css);

WebViewPage.WriteLiteralTo(@__razor_helper_writer, "\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"140\" scrolling=\"no\" src=\"http://gamercard.xbox.com/");


                                                          WebViewPage.WriteTo(@__razor_helper_writer, HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode(gamerTag));

WebViewPage.WriteLiteralTo(@__razor_helper_writer, ".card\" width=\"204\">");


                                                                                                                  WebViewPage.WriteTo(@__razor_helper_writer, gamerTag);

WebViewPage.WriteLiteralTo(@__razor_helper_writer, "</iframe>\r\n");



});

}


    }
}
